channel.title: Comments on: Corona Labs Does Global Game Jam, San Francisco Style

item.title: By: David Rangel
item.dc:creator: David Rangel
item.description: Nice job Dustin! How about that - amazing that you can now code something in one weekend and have it up for sale globally right away...
item.content:encoded:
Nice job Dustin!
How about that – amazing that you can now code something in one weekend and have it up for sale globally right away…

item.title: By: Dustin Quasar
item.dc:creator: Dustin Quasar
item.description:
We used Corona to create our game jam game in Vancouver, Canada. We knocked out a pretty awesome little game in the weekend, that's now up on Google Play for free. Check out Conga King:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sillysoft.conga
item.content:encoded:
We used Corona to create our game jam game in Vancouver, Canada. We knocked out a pretty awesome little game in the weekend, that’s now up on Google Play for free. Check out Conga King:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sillysoft.conga
